snippet: A panel of respected figures from Russia’s art world issued an emotional appeal to President Vladimir V. Putin to make an exception to a recent ban on adoptions by Americans.
abstract: Panel of respected figures from Russia’s art world issue emotional appeal to Pres Vladimir V Putin to make exception to ban on adoptions by Americans and allow children to join American parents they have already come to know.
lead_paragraph: A panel of respected figures from Russia’s art world issued an emotional appeal to President Vladimir V. Putin to make an exception to a recent ban on adoptions by Americans.

headline.main: Performers Urge Russia to Permit Adoptions
headline.print_headline: Performers Urge Russia To Permit Adoptions
